title: 2021 World Grand Prix
description:
The 2021 BoyleSports World Grand Prix will be a darts tournament and the 24th staging of the World Grand Prix. It will be held from 3–9 October 2021 at the Morningside Arena in Leicester, England. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the tournament will be held away from the Citywest Hotel in Dublin for the second consecutive year.
Gerwyn Price is the defending champion, after defeating Dirk van Duijvenbode 5–2 in the 2020 final.
